Write-Up Text: The latest Federal Budget has created quite a buzz amongst people who are eager to learn the implications it may have on their lives. Treasurer Jim Chalmers MP's budget includes significant relief measures such as hikes in the Commonwealth Rent Assistance improvements to the Home Guarantee Scheme and increases to Centrelink payments. Meanwhile analysts share their thoughts outlining potential winners and losers and identifying the challenges of a budget that relies on favorable economic conditions.
